title: @Riot
body: I think it's about time the Riot VS Community matches happened again. I'm sure most people would agree it was fun for those participating and entertaining for those watching. It's a great opportunity for Rioters and community members to interact outside of boards and being randomly matched in-game.

replies.body: yes, I need to get revenge on riot for my ascension loss.

Haven't posted on boards for four months... (remember me, KudosInc, Koala with Ebola, Rumble x Tristy?!!)

Yeah we need a rematch, and maybe this time we can have the PENTA as rengar, not just the quadra, that was stolen by zed :P'

I remember you!
But do you remember me :P
#nohints
Penta's must always be stolen.
Pull out D Cane again Tomat0 :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m3mm8ZON,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-26T06:00:22.911+0000)
>
> Pull out D Cane again Tomat0 :^)

nah I have something better up my sleeve.
I think Riot should develop a routine for these Riot vs Community matches. Like host a game on the first Saturday at 12pm AEST of each month or something like that.

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m3mm8ZON,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-26T00:43:15.284+0000)
>
> I think Riot should develop a routine for these Riot vs Community matches. Like host a game on the first Saturday at 12pm AEST of each month or something like that.

Who is awake before 12pm? Nerds with no social lives, that's who.
So... Everyone who plays league? What's the problem?

Funny lol he posted this at 11:13AM AEST

So by posting this he just called himself a nerd with no social life. Backfire m8
By making the post of "everyone who plays league" he did that anyway, what's your point exactly?
I think talon was referring to sackboy.
I was
That may be it.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m3mm8ZON,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-26T01:04:33.652+0000)
>
> Who is awake before 12pm? Nerds with no social lives, that's who.

People that dont get drunk every single night.
My social life = League of Legends.
There should be alternating maps if this is the case; give TT, HA and CS as much love as SR.
Is it sad i sat here thinking about what map was CS for like 5 minutes?
Haha not at all. Most of us haven't played on that map for well over a year.
{{champion:72}} "I miss my kind..."

Ah, I've been planning on making a thread about this.

Didn't know how to word it without sounding like a prick :P
MasterMirkinen has duo a few ranks with me. I agree more roit community interaction would be nice.
